message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going any lower than this. Let's end this before the inflation eats away all our gains!
You're worried about inflation, I'm worried about getting a good deal. Meet me in the middle... of my side
Alright, Bob. This is my final offer. I'm tired of this game, and I don't want to lose more money to inflation. Let's be reasonable and finish this.
